QuestData.Title: Message to Greymane
QuestData.Description: It's time, $n. We'll take it from here.$B$BTell King Greymane that my father's arsenal will be at his disposal. There's more than enough firepower here to blow the worgen from here to the north sea.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to King Genn Greymane in the Military District.
QuestData.RewardText: I knew Crowley would come through. His weapons will be more than useful to us.
